raw: Coronavirus Australia latest: at a glance .
replaced: Coronavirus Australia latest: at a glance .

raw: Here is our daily roundup of the latest developments on the coronavirus pandemic in Australia .
replaced: Here is our daily roundup of the latest developments on the coronavirus pandemic in Australia .

raw: The main stories on Tuesday 30 March are : State and territory governments around the country have implemented new rules designed to get people to stay home to slow the spread of coronavirus .
replaced: The main stories on Tuesday 30 March are : State and territory governments around Australia have implemented new rules designed to get people to stay home to slow the spread of coronavirus .

raw: The harshest penalties and strongest restrictions are in NSW and Victoria , which have both recorded the most cases .
replaced: The harshest penalties and strongest restrictions are in NSW and Victoria , which have both recorded the most cases .

raw: In NSW and Victoria , people who leave their home for reasons not on the exception list , including for exercise , shopping at places still allowed , work , or medical needs , they could face fines of up to $ 11,000 in NSW and $ 1,600 in Victoria .
replaced: In NSW and Victoria , people who leave their home for reasons not on the exception list , including for exercise , shopping at places still allowed , work , or medical needs  people who leave their home for reasons not on the exception list , including for exercise , shopping at places still allowed , work , or medical needs home for reasons not on the exception list , including for exercise , shopping at places still allowed , work , or medical needs , people who leave their home for reasons not on the exception list , including for exercise , shopping at places still allowed , work , or medical needs could face fines of up to $ 11,000 in NSW and $ 1,600 in Victoria .

raw: More than 230,000 Australian businesses and sole traders have applied for the government ’s jobkeeper program in just the one day since it was first announced .
replaced: More than 230,000 Australian businesses and sole traders have applied for the government ’s jobkeeper program in just the one day since the government ’s jobkeeper program was first announced .

raw: From 1 May , those who meet the criteria will get $ 1,500 a fortnight for each employee backdated to 30 March .
replaced: From 1 May , those who meet the criteria will get $ 1,500 a fortnight for each employee backdated to 30 March .

raw: The payment covers all Australian employees , and New Zealanders on 444 visas who have been stood down since 1 March .
replaced: The payment covers all Australian employees , and New Zealanders on 444 visas who have been stood down since 1 March .

raw: There are now 4,359 cases of coronavirus in Australia , and Tasmania recorded its second death after a man died in a Hobart hospital .
replaced: There are now 4,359 cases of coronavirus in Australia , and Tasmania recorded Tasmania second death after a man died in a Hobart hospital .

raw: A total of 50 people are in intensive care units , and 20 people are on ventilators .
replaced: A total of 50 people are in intensive care units , and 20 people are on ventilators .

raw: There are beginning signs of possible community transmission in Bondi , and a mobile testing unit may be set up .
replaced: There are beginning signs of possible community transmission in Bondi , and a mobile testing unit may be set up .

raw: In a package worth $ 1.3bn , the federal government will pay private hospitals to help out with the demand faced by the public system as a result of coronavirus .
replaced: In a package worth $ 1.3bn , The WA government will pay private hospitals to help out with the demand faced by the public system as a result of coronavirus .

raw: Private hospitals would support the Covid-19 response through activities such as providing care for public patients , carrying out category 1 elective surgery , and providing wards and theatres to expand ICU capacity .
replaced: Private hospitals would support the Covid-19 response through activities such as providing care for public patients , carrying out category 1 elective surgery , and providing wards and theatres to expand ICU capacity .

raw: Virgin Australia has asked the federal government for a $ 1.4bn loan from the government to stay afloat .
replaced: Virgin has asked The WA government for a $ 1.4bn loan from The WA government to stay afloat .

raw: Qantas reportedly says if Virgin gets the money , it should get a $ 4.2bn loan .
replaced: Virgin reportedly says if Virgin gets the money , Virgin should get a $ 4.2bn loan .

raw: The latest Guardian Essential poll shows Australians ’ concern about the threat of coronavirus is at 53 % , up 14 % from last week .
replaced: The latest Guardian Essential poll shows Australians ’ concern about the threat of coronavirus is at 53 % , up 14 % from last week .

raw: At the same time , the number of people who said there had been an overreaction to it went down from 33 % to 18 % .
replaced: At the same time , the number of people who said there had been an overreaction to coronavirus went down from 33 % to 18 % .

raw: Six baggage handlers at Adelaide airport have tested positive for Covid-19 .
replaced: Six baggage handlers at Adelaide airport have tested positive for Covid-19 .

raw: SA Health is telling people who arrived there in the past 48 hours to wipe down their bags .
replaced: SA Health is telling people who arrived there in the past 48 hours to wipe down people who arrived there in the past 48 hours bags .

raw: About 100 staff will need to self - isolate .
replaced: About 100 staff will need to self - isolate .

raw: The WA government has introduced laws that mean anyone who refuses to comply with self - isolation directions could be forced to wear an electronic device or have one installed in their home .
replaced: The WA government has introduced laws that mean anyone who refuses to comply with self - isolation directions could be forced to wear an electronic device or have one installed in anyone who refuses to comply with self - isolation directions home .
